channel.title: Need ip contains ban!
channel.description: yea.. i have some noob that keeps changing his ips to spam my server with the stupidest stuff..what code would i be able to use to ban what an ip contains?? [code] cust.bredbandsbolaget.se mi.sccoast.net [/code] this is the main only 2 he uses so far for what they contain (i wont give out the entire ip...) but i need to be able to BAN them PERMENENTALLy>.. until he completely stops this noncense

item.title: Need ip contains ban!
item.dc:creator: @wwe4eva wwe4eva
item.description:
@wwe4eva wrote:

create an account with names like his with random pw’s. then when he tries to connect with those names, he wont be able too.

Also, if theirs loads of them or their names are syi dh fjsa - stuff like that, it wud be very hard to be able to ip ban. So when this happends just simply do ::bootall. Sometimes if they use blitzbot they can null your server in like 30 seconds. always best to do ::bootall or watever ur command is.

Read full topic

item.title: Need ip contains ban!
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

He’s using a proxy, i suggest you add a proxy detector on server, which will auto-ban.

Read full topic

item.title: Need ip contains ban!
item.dc:creator: @_ikram _ikram
item.description:
@_ikram wrote:

Use something like this:

if (normalTalk.contains("www.") || normalTalk.contains(".com") || normalTalk.contains("no-ip") || normalTalk.contains("no ip") || normalTalk.contains(".org") || normalTalk.contains(".net") || normalTalk.contains(".info")) { plrBlackmarks += 1; msgSend("You have a total of "+ plrBlackmarks +" infraction(s) on your account."); return; }

and add certains words which the spammer is using to block him, maybe use his username.

Read full topic
